item.title: iOS APNs/APS Environments
item.description: At work, we’re working on a React Native mobile app. For our iOS deployment, we have our test builds (that consumes APIs in a testing environment) going to MS App Center, and production builds going to TestFlight, eventually being promoted to the App Store. We use MS Notification Hub to handle our push notifications that are triggered by internal systems etc. but we wanted to achieve a situation where we were using a testing APNs environment (i.
